Bleeding disorders can be the result of other diseases, such as severe liver disease. They can also be inherited. Hemophilia is an inherited bleeding disorder. Bleeding disorders can also be a side effect of medicines.",MPlusHealthTopics,Bleeding Disorders
What is (are) Parasitic Diseases ?,"Parasites are living things that use other living things - like your body - for foo
